SPECIFIC OBLIGATIONS OF A SPOUSE
(1) Specific obligations of a spouse shall be those a spouse had before concluding marriage, and those assumed after concluding marriage, which, however, are not joint obligations of spouses under paragraph one of Article 82 of this Code.
(2) The liability for specific obligations shall be assumed by a spouse with their separate property and their share in co-owned property.
